attributes.action: Allow outdoor sports such as open water swimming to continue during lockdowns
attributes.additional_details:
Mental
Health has been one of the biggest challenges throughout the pandemic. With all other forms of exercise closed outdoor and open air swimming would help to combat this and is known for its many health benefits
attributes.background: Open water swimming including venues such as managed lakes and open air pools allow individuals to benefit from both exercise and mental health benefits. With health risks at these venues being significantly lower than the knock on effect of poor mental health we believe they should be open

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555079
